summary: Trailed by a clan of female ninja, Ogami is paid to assassinate a clan traitor accompanied by three killers known as the Gods of Death.
cast: Tomisaburô Wakayama|Kayo Matsuo|Akiji Kobayashi|Minoru Ôki|Shin Kishida|Shôgen Nitta|Takashi Ebata|Kappei Matsumoto|Akihiro Tomikawa|Izumi Ayukawa|Kazutarô Kuni|Maki Mizuhara|Ima Masaki|Reiko Kasahara|Yuriko Mishima|Yukari Wakayama|Michi Azuma|Tadashi Hiraizumi|Yasuhiro Minakami|Ichirô Yamamoto|Yûzaburô Sakaguchi|Shintarô Nanjô|Hinode Nishikawa|Etsujirô Yamaoka|Takuya Kitano|Seishirô Hara|Akira Hirasawa|Toshio Kitajewa|Seiji Ikeda|Mordaka Iwao|Kenji Damizu|Yûtarô Ban|Juin Fujiamo|Kazuo Mortuchi|Juniro Nizaj|Yashiaitae Shimomora|Orie Satô|Minsko Takagi|Chiako Furubayeshi
title: Kozure Ôkami: Sanzu no kawa no ubaguruma
